mapper.insert: insert into al_order (order_id, user_id, activity_id, order_rmb, gold, order_statue, create_date) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderRmb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gold,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderStatue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update al_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_rmb = #{orderRmb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gold = #{gold,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_statue = #{orderStatue,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, activity_id, order_rmb, gold, order_statue, create_date from al_order
